title: Jackson Cannon's The Squeeze Recipe
full_text:
Jackson Cannon's The Squeeze Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
1
ounce
vodka
1
ounce
blood orange juice
1/2
ounce
St Germain
1/4
ounce
simple syrup
2
dashes
Peychaud's bitters
1
ounce
chilled
sparkling wine
Garnish:
orange twist
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add vodka, blood orange juice, St Germain, simple syrup, and bitters. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass, add sparkling wine. Garnish with orange twist.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker and strainer
Vodka
Summer Drinks
